content: welcome to the basket loop beanie this beginner-friendly pattern aims to equip you with the essential steps to create a cozy and stylish beanie using basic knitting techniques whether you re new to knitting or seeking a quick project this pattern provides a straightforward yet rewarding experience the instructions for the pattern are available both in charted form and written out allowing you the freedom to choose the method that best suits your preference for following along one size fits all to fit an average adult head will stretch to comfortably fit up to 54 cm 21 you can find a video tutorial but in greek language here https //youtu be/8jhpnwommbo materials - katia azteca 53% virgin wool - 47% acrylic 180m/197yd per 100g ball color 7878 1 ball - 4 mm us 6 40cm 16 circular knitting needles - 5 mm us 8 40cm 16 circular knitting needles - 5 mm us 8 100cm 40 circular knitting needles or set of dpns - one stitch marker - tapestry needle - pom-pon maker tool please take time to check gauge measurements were taken with the knitted fabric slightly stretched with smaller needles and in 1x1 ribbing 17 sts and 24 rounds = 10x10 cm 4x4 with larger needles and in basket loop pattern 14 sts and 22 rounds = 10x10 cm 4x4
